title: temp_svchostexe
extract: Svchost.exe virus removal step by step: Step1: Reboot your computer into Safe Mode. Step2: Remove associated svchost.exe virus files usually located at “C:\Windows\Temp\svchost.exe”. Step3: Remove associated svchost.exe virus Registry Information.Feb 14, 2015
